name: Samantha Fox Strip Poker
overview: Samantha Fox Strip Poker is a video game developed by Software Communications and published by Martech for a range of home computers. The BBC Microcomputer version was ported by Catalyst Coders. In this game, you play 5-card or 7-card stud poker, depending on the system. You are playing against Samantha Fox, a well known model and singer in the UK.
